author: Special Correspondent
text:
A district-level consumer grievance redressal meeting on issues related to supply of cooking gas would be held on January 25 at the Collectorate.

In a statement, the Virudhunagar Collector, V. Rajaram, said that the meeting, chaired by the District Revenue Officer, would be held at 4 p.m.

Consumers have been asked to participate in the meeting to get their grievances, if any, redressed.
title: Grievance redressal meeting
